languages.text: "Кто? А, вы, видимо, про Кошмары... Храни нас Бог-Император! Эти исчадия рыщут и на поверхности, и в глубинах — бичи наши за грехи перед Священным! Попав в их когти, никто не возвращается, ибо такова воля Всевышнего. Есть те, кто убивает сразу, есть и другие, кто утаскивает живьем. Есть же и те, что обратились в живой кошмар, сосущий души..."

traits.locale_text: "Кто? А, вы, видимо, про Кошмары... Храни нас Бог-Император! Эти исчадия рыщут и на поверхности, и в глубинах — бичи наши за грехи перед Священным! Попав в их когти, никто не возвращается, ибо такова воля Всевышнего. Есть те, кто убивает сразу, есть и другие, кто утаскивает живьем. Есть же и те, что обратились в живой кошмар, сосущий души..."

languages.text: "Who? Oh, you must be taken about the Nightmares... God-Emperor preserve us! These beasts are prowling both in the depths and on the surface, they are the scourge for our transgressions before the Holiest One! Nobody ever returns from their clutches, for such is the will of the Divine. There are some who kill quickly, while others drag people into the dark, screaming. And some have turned into walking nightmares that feed on people's souls..."
languages.original_text: "Кто? А, вы, видимо, про Кошмары... Храни нас Бог-Император! Эти исчадия рыщут и на поверхности, и в глубинах — бичи наши за грехи перед Священным! Попав в их когти, никто не возвращается, ибо такова воля Всевышнего. Есть те, кто убивает сразу, есть и другие, кто утаскивает живьем. Есть же и те, что обратились в живой кошмар, сосущий души..."

traits.locale_text: "Who? Oh, you must be taken about Nightmares... God-Emperor preserve us! These beasts are prowling both in the depths and on the surface, they are the scourge for our sins before the Holiest One! Nobody ever returns form the clutches, for such is the will of the Divine. There are some who kill quickly, others are dragging people into the dark, screaming. And some have turned into walking nightmares that feed on people's souls..."

languages.text: 「誰ですって？ああ、悪夢のことを言っているのでしょうか…神帝陛下よ、私たちをお守りください！これらの獣は深淵にも地上にも徘徊しており、神聖なる御方の御前での私たちの罪に対する災厄なのです！その魔の手にかかった者は決して戻りません、それが神の意志ですから。すぐに殺す者もいれば、叫び声を上げながら人々を闇へ引きずり込む者もいます。そして、人々の魂を喰らう歩く悪夢へと変わった者さえも…」
languages.original_text: "Who? Oh, you must be taken about the Nightmares... God-Emperor preserve us! These beasts are prowling both in the depths and on the surface, they are the scourge for our transgressions before the Holiest One! Nobody ever returns from their clutches, for such is the will of the Divine. There are some who kill quickly, while others drag people into the dark, screaming. And some have turned into walking nightmares that feed on people's souls..."

traits.locale_text: 「誰ですって？ああ、悪夢のことを言っているのでしょうか…神帝陛下よ、私たちをお守りください！これらの獣は深淵にも地上にも徘徊しており、神聖なる御方の御前での私たちの罪に対する災厄なのです！その魔の手にかかった者は決して戻りません、それが神の意志ですから。すぐに殺す者もいれば、叫び声を上げながら人々を闇へ引きずり込む者もいます。そして、人々の魂を喰らう歩く悪夢へと変わった者さえも…」

languages.text: « Qui ça ? Oh, vous voulez parler des cauchemars.... Que l'Empereur-Dieu nous préserve ! Ces monstres rôdent aussi bien à la surface que sous terre, il s'agit d'un fléau qui nous a été infligé pour avoir transgressé la volonté de l'Être Divin ! Personne n'échappe à leurs griffes, car c'est là Sa volonté. Certains tuent rapidement leurs victimes, tandis que d'autres les emportent, hurlantes, dans l'obscurité. Et d'autres encore se transforment en cauchemars ambulants qui se nourrissent de l'âme des vivants... »
languages.original_text: "Who? Oh, you must be taken about the Nightmares... God-Emperor preserve us! These beasts are prowling both in the depths and on the surface, they are the scourge for our transgressions before the Holiest One! Nobody ever returns from their clutches, for such is the will of the Divine. There are some who kill quickly, while others drag people into the dark, screaming. And some have turned into walking nightmares that feed on people's souls..."

traits.locale_text: « Qui ça ? Oh, vous voulez parler des cauchemars.... Que l'Empereur-Dieu nous préserve ! Ces monstres rôdent aussi bien à la surface que sous terre, il s'agit d'un fléau qui nous a été infligé pour avoir transgressé la volonté de l'Être Divin ! Personne n'échappe à leurs griffes, car c'est là Sa volonté. Certains tuent rapidement leurs victimes, tandis que d'autres les emportent, hurlantes, dans l'obscurité. Et d'autres encore se transforment en cauchemars ambulants qui se nourrissent de l'âme des vivants... »

languages.text: “那些什么？噢，你指的肯定是‘梦魇’吧……愿神皇保佑我们！那些怪物在地面和地下到处游荡！我们犯下了罪行，神皇派他们来惩罚我们！没人能从它们的魔掌中逃脱，因为这就是祂的旨意。有的梦魇几下就能要了人的命，有的梦魇会把人拖入黑暗之中，让他们放声尖叫，还有的梦魇变成了可怕的怪物，以人们的灵魂为食……”
languages.original_text: "Who? Oh, you must be taken about the Nightmares... God-Emperor preserve us! These beasts are prowling both in the depths and on the surface, they are the scourge for our transgressions before the Holiest One! Nobody ever returns from their clutches, for such is the will of the Divine. There are some who kill quickly, while others drag people into the dark, screaming. And some have turned into walking nightmares that feed on people's souls..."

traits.locale_text: “那些什么？噢，你指的肯定是‘梦魇’吧……愿神皇保佑我们！那些怪物在地面和地下到处游荡！我们犯下了罪行，神皇派他们来惩罚我们！没人能从它们的魔掌中逃脱，因为这就是祂的旨意。有的梦魇几下就能要了人的命，有的梦魇会把人拖入黑暗之中，让他们放声尖叫，还有的梦魇变成了可怕的怪物，以人们的灵魂为食……”

languages.text: «¿Quién? Ah, {mf|le|la} habrán embaucado las pesadillas... ¡que el Dios Emperador nos guarde! Estas bestias acechan tanto las profundidades como la superficie; ¡son el azote por nuestras ofensas al Altísimo! Nadie regresa jamás de sus garras, pues tal es Su voluntad. Hay unos que matan en el acto, pero otros arrastran, entre gritos, a sus presas hasta la oscuridad. Y algunos se han convertido en pesadillas andantes que se alimentan de las almas de la gente...».
languages.original_text: "Who? Oh, you must be taken about the Nightmares... God-Emperor preserve us! These beasts are prowling both in the depths and on the surface, they are the scourge for our transgressions before the Holiest One! Nobody ever returns from their clutches, for such is the will of the Divine. There are some who kill quickly, while others drag people into the dark, screaming. And some have turned into walking nightmares that feed on people's souls..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quién? Ah, {mf|le|la} habrán embaucado las pesadillas... ¡que el Dios Emperador nos guarde! Estas bestias acechan tanto las profundidades como la superficie; ¡son el azote por nuestras ofensas al Altísimo! Nadie regresa jamás de sus garras, pues tal es Su voluntad. Hay unos que matan en el acto, pero otros arrastran, entre gritos, a sus presas hasta la oscuridad. Y algunos se han convertido en pesadillas andantes que se alimentan de las almas de la gente...».

languages.text: "Wer? Ach, Ihr meint bestimmt die Albträume ... Der Gottimperator bewahre uns! Diese Monster schleichen sowohl in den Tiefen als auch an der Oberfläche umher. Sie sind die Geißeln für unsere Verstöße gegen den Heiligsten! Niemand kehrt je aus ihren Klauen zurück, denn das ist der Wille des Göttlichen. Manche von ihnen töten schnell, andere verschleppen die Leuten schreiend in die Dunkelheit. Und einige sind zu wandelnden Albträumen geworden, die sich an Seelen laben ..."
languages.original_text: "Who? Oh, you must be taken about the Nightmares... God-Emperor preserve us! These beasts are prowling both in the depths and on the surface, they are the scourge for our transgressions before the Holiest One! Nobody ever returns from their clutches, for such is the will of the Divine. There are some who kill quickly, while others drag people into the dark, screaming. And some have turned into walking nightmares that feed on people's souls..."

traits.locale_text: "Wer? Ach, Ihr meint bestimmt die Albträume ... Der Gottimperator bewahre uns! Diese Monster schleichen sowohl in den Tiefen als auch an der Oberfläche umher. Sie sind die Geißeln für unsere Verstöße gegen den Heiligsten! Niemand kehrt je aus ihren Klauen zurück, denn das ist der Wille des Göttlichen. Manche von ihnen töten schnell, andere verschleppen die Leuten schreiend in die Dunkelheit. Und einige sind zu wandelnden Albträumen geworden, die sich an Seelen laben ..."

languages.text: "Kim? Ah, Kâbusları diyor olmalısınız... Tanrı İmparator esirgesin! Bu canavarlar hem yerin derinliklerinde hem de yüzeyinde fink atıyor, Hürmetli'ye rağmen işlediğimiz günahlarımızın cezası onlar! Onların pençesine düşenler kurtulamaz, Kutsal Olan'ın emri böyledir. Bazıları hızlıca öldürür, bazıları da insanları çığlıklar eşliğinde karanlığa çeker. Bir de insanların ruhundan beslenen ve yaşayan birer kâbusa dönüşenler var..."
languages.original_text: "Who? Oh, you must be taken about the Nightmares... God-Emperor preserve us! These beasts are prowling both in the depths and on the surface, they are the scourge for our transgressions before the Holiest One! Nobody ever returns from their clutches, for such is the will of the Divine. There are some who kill quickly, while others drag people into the dark, screaming. And some have turned into walking nightmares that feed on people's souls..."

traits.locale_text: "Kim? Ah, Kâbuslardan bahsediyor olmalısınız... Tanrı İmparator esirgesin! Bu canavarlar hem yerin derinliklerinde hem de yüzeyinde fink atıyor, Hürmetlimizden önceki günahlarımızın cezası onlar! Onların pençesine düşenler kurtulamaz, Kutsal Olan'ın emri böyledir. Bazıları hızlıca öldürür, bazıları da insanları çığlıklar içinde karanlığa çeker. Bir de insanların ruhundan beslenen ve yaşayan birer kâbusa dönüşenler var..."
